synopsis.text:
Heavens.Inside the Martial Realm, Earth, the power of the Martial Ancestor instills fear in all. At the West Heaven Temple, the Emperor of a Hundred Battles reigns supreme. In the Northern Desolate Hill, a land of countless graves, the Immortal Owner holds dominion. From the Northern Spiritual Realm, a young boy emerges, soaring on a Nine Netherworld Bird, ready to traverse the vibrant and varied world. Who will claim their destiny and become the ultimate Great Ruler? In this vast expanse of intersecting planes, clans, and lords, the ambition to rule is relentless.

In this boundless universe, the Northern Spiritual Realm witnesses a bitter rivalry between the Liu Territory and Mu Territory. Liu Jingtian, the Liu Territory's master, is secretly orchestrating a grand conspiracy. Mu Chen, the young heir of Mu Territory, finds love in Luo Li along the Spiritual Road, only to be expelled due to the Blood Calamity. Vowing to reunite with Luo Li at the Five Great Academies, Mu Chen embarks on his journey to become the Great Lord, carrying the future of Mu Territory and his promise on his shoulders. The path to becoming a Great Ruler is fraught with challenges, but many strive for it nonetheless in the Great Thousand World.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
